turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I am wanting to order a Caffe Mocha from Starbucks to pick up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, I can set that up for you. Which location would you like to pick it up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on 1877 Wentzville Pkwy, in Wentzville.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I found that location. What size Caffe Mocha would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Venti.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. What type of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Whole Milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like whipped creme?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else I can get for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No that will be all today

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds good, I have a Venti Caffe Mocha with whole milk and whipped creme. Is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It should be ready at your local Wentzville starbucks.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I am sending you a recipt to your mobile device

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Good evening.
